typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	NumberOfDays as integer (5)
}
source(output(
		id as short,
		country as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		station as string,
		last_update as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		pollutant_id as string,
		pollutant_min as string,
		pollutant_max as string,
		pollutant_avg as string,
		pollutant_unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(), -$NumberOfDays)),
	modifiedBefore: (currentTimestamp()),
	wildcardPaths:['**/**/*.csv']) ~> pollutiondatacsv
pollutiondatacsv sink(input(
		id as string,
		country as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		station as string,
		last_update as string,
		pollutant_id as string,
		pollutant_min as string,
		pollutant_max as string,
		pollutant_avg as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		country,
		state,
		city,
		station,
		last_update,
		pollutant_id,
		pollutant_min,
		pollutant_max,
		pollutant_avg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> pollutionoutputstreamtosql
